title: IMAGE detail page Â» Nodes
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see to which nodes an IMAGE is connected to\
So I can find out where a connection might be missing or makes no sense
description:
* The IMAGE detail page contains a section with a list of all connected NODES.
* Each NODE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each NODE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each NODE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no NODE connected to the IMAGE then the section is not displayed at all.
